name: The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+
description:
Isaac has discovered a labyrinth beneath his own house, filled with
monsters, power-ups and unimaginable treasure. Can he survive the
physical challenges and psychological trials of a world he never made?

The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+ is a dungeon-crawling shoot-'em-up
that’s literally a different game each and every time you play it! The
randomly generated maps are built with over 11,000 unique room
configurations, each populated with a nearly endless variety of enemies,
items, challenges and secrets!

The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+ includes:

Over 600 different items to collect

13 unique playable characters

More than 180 individual enemy types

90+ terrifying, deadly bosses

Multiple difficulty settings and game modes

Bestiary to record enemy encounters

20 professionally animated cartoon endings

AND MANY MORE SECRETS!
